title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Multi-Case Studies for Online Assessment Strategy Design and Application

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Analyze the strengths and weaknesses of various online assessment methods and select appropriate ones for specific contexts.
Identify problems encountered in online assessment design through case studies and propose improvement strategies.

Learners can establish an online assessment plan (two quizzes, one practical assignment, one project) linked to learning objectives of the development process (front-end/back-end) within three weeks and receive over 80% suitability approval from a team leader based on a rubric.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
